alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; Lower Clark Fork Region; Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Air Stagnation Advisory issued October 30 at 4:19PM MDT until November 01 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...AIR STAGNATION ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Stagnant conditions will trap pollutants, leading to deteriorating air quality. * WHERE...Flathead/Mission Valleys, Kootenai/Cabinet Region, West Glacier Region, Lower Clark Fork Region, Missoula/Bitterroot Valleys, and Potomac/Seeley Lake Region. * WHEN...Until noon MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Periods of air stagnation can lead to the build up of pollutants near the surface.
info.instruction: Persons with respiratory illness should follow their physicians advice for dealing with high levels of air pollution during periods of stagnant air. According to state air quality agencies, prolonged period of stagnant air can hold pollutants close to the ground where people live and breathe. Check with your local burn agency for any current restrictions in your area.

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; Lower Clark Fork Region; Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region; West Glacier Region
